title: Classic Sci-Fi - Stories from the Greatest Science Fiction Authors of All Time
description: Enjoy this collection of science fiction stories brought together from the master story tellers of all time!From the writers who influenced TV programs and movies such as 'LOST', 'Total Recall', 'Blade Runner' and 'The Adjustment Bureau' comes a collection of some of the most important sci-fi of the 19th and 20th Century.These prolific writers have created such works of wonder that their influence is still seen today in contemporary TV and movies. Enjoy this collection of classic writers collected in one book today.
author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
